name: Snake Infibite
description:
The Ouroboros snake has been tasked with collecting the sacred cat idols from the Egyptians but the local wildlife are not happy about it.  Collect as many idols as you can before the lord gives up on you and lets you rot in the sand!

Controls: A & D (or Left & Right Arrows) to move left and right.  Space to jump

Most of the Sound FX are not mine, except the VoiceOver work which was me, but I made everything else in the game :)

Thank you to everybody who gave me support in making my first game for the epic JimJam!
